name: Stick Battle Arena (UPDATED)
description:
One on one fight to the death. A simple game with simple fighting mechanics. Made it in a couple days. Might make it into a full fledged game later for android. Enjoy!

UPDATES!!

  • Revamped Enemy AI to be harder
  • Made the AI more defensive 
  • Made AI harder to defeat by simply mashing buttons
  • AI attacks constantly if cornered 
  • Fixed a few bugs to polish the game a bit.
